titles: The true and perfect copie of a godly sermon preached in the minister at Lincolne, by the reuerend father in God, Thomas L. Bishop of Lincolne the .28. of August. Anno. 1575.
author: Cooper, Thomas, 1517?-1594.
publisher: By Henrie Middleton for Rafe Newberie, dwelling in Fleetestrete alitle aboue the Condite,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
